title: Surge (Eclipse Comics)
description:
Like a tick on a hemophiliac, the ECUP stays busy, with 'Surge'!

Co-written by Mark Evanier and Rick Hoberg, illustrated by Al Gordon, Surge is a four-issue mini featuring that dude from DNAgents. It was released in 1984. And it featured that dude. Surge. Before he was transformed into a soda.

As always, copious amounts of props to the creative team and the scanners! Download it, upload it!
